:medium   (AMR annotation guidance)

Examples of typical :medium entities include radio, television, newspaper, web, Facebook, Twitter, languages.

Example:  The mayor announced his resignation on Twitter .
     (a / announce-01
           :ARG0 (p2 / person
                 :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                       :ARG2 (m / mayor)))
           :ARG1 (r / resign-01
                 :ARG0 p2
                 :ARG1 m)
           :medium (p / publication :wiki "Twitter" :name (n / name :op1 "Twitter")))

Example:  The new book has been heavily advertised on the web .
     (a / advertise-01
           :ARG1 (b / book
                 :ARG1-of (n / new-01))
           :medium (w / web)
           :manner (h / heavy))

Example:  She talked to him in French.
     (t / talk-01
           :ARG0 (s / she)
           :ARG2 (h / he)
           :medium (l / language :wiki "French_language"
                 :name (n / name :op1 "French")))
